ygData.subject: RE: Guild Matters
ygData.msgSnippet: Thx ;) Hmm, mechical is cool.  Now I got Magic in my team, he got 90 plus mech, use him to go around picking locks and looting stuffs, save alot of money. As
ygData.messageBody:
Thx ;)

Hmm, mechical is cool. Now I got Magic in my team, he got 90 plus mech,
use him to go around picking locks and looting stuffs, save alot of money.

As for explosion, never use so far. When selecting merc, I go for one with
high markmanship, high stats. My char still stuck in STR, dunno what to
train with to increase STR. CGW say find something to hit, I try those
sparring bags in Kingpin club but cannot use them. Can teach? ;)

On Thursday, 14 October, 1999 11:50 AM, Ebon Praetor
[SMTP:kelc@...] wrote:
> From: "Ebon Praetor" <kelc@...>
>
> From: LKW <leekw13@...>
> Subject: RE: [sg-everquest] Guild Matters
>
> > Hey I forget how to climb to roof, can teach me? During my 1st
> mission I
> > did it once, coz one enemy on roof, but later forget how to go abt
doing it
> > again ;) CGW Nov issue has some good tips on how to rise ya merc's
stats
> > and skills. Worth take a look.
>
> Get your merc right up next to the wall... then click and drag up...
> all the way. Only flat roofs can be climbed up onto. It's just like
> changing stance... for example, when changing stance from prone
> to standing, you click on the merc and drag up, you will see 2 up
> arrows next to him, right? Drag somemore, and you will see
> another kind of "ladder" arrow if you are next to a roof.
>
> By the time the CGW article came out, I had pumped my merc's
> STR and AGI to +10 liao.... *heh* I regret one thing though... I
> should have set explosives and mechanical to zero... *sigh*
>
>
> --
>
>
> Love is in the air...
> Get me a gas mask, quick!!!
>
> Cya,
> Praetor
>
> Praetor@...
> ICQ 1767778
>
> > Singapore Everquest Players List
